topic.title: CIS 241 Week 1 Welcome to 2017-Fall
topic.text:
Welcome to CIS 241 - WEB DEVELOPMENT I , 2017-Fall Week 1 - Pre-Assessment.

Please click on Modules and Introduction: What you need to know...START HERE to start the course.  

Course materials  and assignments for each week are posted on Monday of each week and the assignment is usually due on the following Monday.  

Be sure to come in to see me if you have any problems or questions.

 

Louis

9/17/2017

Instructor/Advisor: Ying Louis HO
Computer Information Systems
Office: Alderwood Hall 235A
Tel:  425-640-1308
Email: louis.ho@email.edcc.edu
Edmonds Community College
Please come in to see me if you have any academic or advising questions.
